member.name: M:LabProg2016.Sharpstone.print_card_death(LabProg2016.Sharpstone.card)
member.summary: Prints the information of a dead cards. Call this function when a card dies.

member.name: M:LabProg2016.Sharpstone.print_turn_no_cards(LabProg2016.Sharpstone.player,LabProg2016.Sharpstone.player)
member.summary: Prints the information of 2 players when both have no cards. Call this function at each turn no cards have been drawn.

member.name: M:LabProg2016.Sharpstone.print_turn_1card(LabProg2016.Sharpstone.player,LabProg2016.Sharpstone.card)
member.summary: Prints the information of 1 card fighting against a player with no cards. Call this function at each turn when only 1 players have a card.

member.name: M:LabProg2016.Sharpstone.print_turn_2cards(LabProg2016.Sharpstone.card,LabProg2016.Sharpstone.card)
member.summary: Prints the information of 2 cards fighting. Call this function at each turn when both players have a card.

member.name: M:LabProg2016.Sharpstone.print_turn_end(LabProg2016.Sharpstone.player,LabProg2016.Sharpstone.player)
member.summary: Prints the status of the 2 players. Call this function at the end of each turn.

member.name: M:LabProg2016.Sharpstone.print_turn_begin(System.Int32)
member.summary: Prints the turn number header. Call this function at the beginning of each turn.

member.summary: Parse a JSON deck given the filename.

member.name: M:LabProg2016.Sharpstone.unjson``1(System.String)
member.summary: Convert a JSON string into a typed value.

member.summary: Generate a random integer within the interval (a, b) inclusively.
